name: meesterproef-semia
description: Meester proef voor de Semia video data visual

scripts.build:js: terser static/js/index.js -c -m -o static/js/index.min.js && terser static/js/detail.js -c -m -o static/js/detail.min.js && terser static/js/filter.js -c -m -o static/js/filter.min.js && terser static/js/history.js -c -m -o static/js/history.min.js && terser static/js/intro.js -c -m -o static/js/intro.min.js && terser static/js/share.js -c -m -o static/js/share.min.js && terser static/js/partials/data.js -c -m -o static/js/partials/data.min.js && terser static/js/partials/element.js -c -m -o static/js/partials/element.min.js && terser static/js/partials/preview.js -c -m -o static/js/partials/preview.min.js && terser static/js/partials/render.js -c -m -o static/js/partials/render.min.js && terser static/js/partials/startScreen.js -c -m -o static/js/partials/startScreen.min.js && terser static/js/partials/timer.js -c -m -o static/js/partials/timer.min.js && terser static/js/partials/url.js -c -m -o static/js/partials/url.min.js
scripts.build:css: postcss static/css/attribute.css > static/css/attribute.min.css && postcss static/css/clock.css > static/css/clock.min.css && postcss static/css/footer.css > static/css/footer.min.css && postcss static/css/keyframes.css > static/css/keyframes.min.css && postcss static/css/master.css > static/css/master.min.css && postcss static/css/nav.css > static/css/nav.min.css && postcss static/css/overlay.css > static/css/overlay.min.css && postcss static/css/share.css > static/css/share.min.css && postcss static/css/startScreen.css > static/css/startScreen.min.css
scripts.build: npm run check:js && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && git status

author: Semia groep
